item.description:
UPDATE: Tonight is also Battery Park's "Kill The Keg Event" with Kill Devil Brown Ale.  Try some awesome beer and try to "kill the keg". Prizes and such.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Hey hey! The fun continues Mondays at Battery Park! Every Monday at 7:00pm join us and Geeks Who Drink http://geekswhodrink.com/518/ for an exciting game.

The quiz consists of 8 rounds of 8 questions and includes a picture round, music round, and chances for FREE BEER! The all female team "Faster Than Usain Bolt" kicked ass and took names last week! I should be there by 6:30pm and will try to reserve us a couple of tables.  Come early to get a good seat and a good team. ;)

Battery Park is conveniently located in the Financial District near State Street (Orange and Blue Line), Downtown Crossing (Orange and Red Lines), and a short walk to Park Street (Red and Green Lines).  Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink.  PLEASE PAY AS YOU GO OR MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB.  You can view Battery Park's menu here: http://www.batteryparkboston.com/.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Pub Quiz with Geeks Who Drink at Battery Park, Monday August 13th
